Ancient:WingAttack.NAME: Wing Attack
Ancient:WingAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies and Gain !M! Dexterity.

Ancient:Teeth.NAME: Teeth
Ancient:Teeth.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage !M! times. Can be upgraded any number of times.

Ancient:Adaptation.NAME: Adaptation
Ancient:Adaptation.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn Gain !M! random Affinity.

Ancient:Exhale.NAME: Exhale
Ancient:Exhale.DESCRIPTION: Apply Debuffs equal to your current Affinities.
Ancient:Exhale.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply Debuffs equal to your current Affinities to ALL enemies.

Ancient:Frenzy.NAME: Frenzy
Ancient:Frenzy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! to a random enemy X times.

Ancient:Slumber.NAME: Slumber
Ancient:Slumber.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Next turn Gain !M! Fire, Ice, and Venom Affinity.
